<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:Application xmlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml" layout="vertical" xmlns:local="*" viewSourceURL="srcview/index.html">
    
    <mx:Style>
        Button.diamond
        {
            skin: Embed(skinClass="diamondButton");
        }
    </mx:Style>
    
    <local:DepthToggleButtonBar id="dtbb" buttonStyleName="diamond" horizontalGap="-30">
        <mx:Button label="About" />
        <mx:Button label="Portfolio" />
        <mx:Button label="Resume" />
        <mx:Button label="Contact" />
    </local:DepthToggleButtonBar>
    
    <!-- Controls to show support for programmatic manipulation -->
    <mx:HBox>
        <mx:NumericStepper id="stepper" minimum="0" maximum="{ dtbb.numChildren - 1 }" />
        <mx:Button label="Set selectedIndex" click="dtbb.selectedIndex = stepper.value" />
    </mx:HBox>
    
</mx:Application>
